description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) in relation to planning permission reference 213386VAR dated 23/03/2022 for 'Redevelopment of the site to provide 149 residential units and 1x ground floor flexible retail/professional services/café or restaurant unit (A1/A2/A3 use classes) accommodated within three residential buildings ranging in height from four to fifteen storeys (inclusive of plant), with associated landscaping and blue badge parking (following demolition of buildings and structures on site). Amendments comprise of the following: design refinements to massing and façade design; reduction is size of commercial unit by 37 sqm; amendment to mix of residential units to reduce the number of studios and two bedroom units and increase the number of one bedroom and three bedroom units; reduction in height of Block B by one habitable floor and increase the height of Block C by 2 habitable floors; building entrances located within Blocks B +C accessed from central courtyard; cycle storage within Blocks B + C relocated adjacent to main building entrances; cycle storage for Blocks B + C relocated within the buildings  '
